metadata.name: Disabled Volume Snapshots
metadata.comment: Detects commands that temporarily turn off Volume Snapshots

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\services\\vss\\diag')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/d disabled')))

output.summary: Detects commands that temporarily turn off Volume Snapshots
